name: Amish Brown Sugar Cake
author: betsybarron27
summary: A delicious and extremely simple Amish recipe for brown sugar cake. Perfect for dunking! If you need less servings, dough keeps frozen for up to 6 months.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon white sugar, or as needed  (Optional)
1 tablespoon ground cinnamon, or as needed  (Optional)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
1 Mix flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Mix in oil, followed by milk
Spread evenly into the prepared pans
Sprinkle white sugar and cinnamon over each
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of each cake comes out clean, about 35 minutes
